description:
A powerful productivity app combining Pomodoro technique, task management, and website blocking

A powerful productivity app combining Pomodoro technique, task management, and website blocking.
Features
- Added minimize to system tray option (disabled by default)
- Added code signing for Windows builds which is provided by SignPath.io
- Added Subtasks
- Added clearer representation of time units in time pickers when editing time of a task
- Added warning messages for actions when no task is selected
- Moved "To Do Tasks" label in Tasks view upwards
- Added shortcut for quit action in system tray menu
Fixes
- Fixed Windows uninstaller to delete all files
Maintenance
- Updated app dependencies
Full Changelog: v1.0.1...v1.1.0
